alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 9:16PM MST until January 15 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and western Texas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...These wind chills will result in frost bite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
